Package controller

Class PhotoController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotoController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PhotoController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller that will handle all things related to the photo object and manipulating any photos.
Author:
Nathaniel Vele, Patrick Liang
